thread.title: Peter Beale to return to EastEnders? | Daily Star
thread.title_full: Peter Beale to return to EastEnders? | Daily Star

author: Sasha Morris
title: Peter Beale to return to EastEnders? | Daily Star
text:
BBC FAN FAVOURITE: Ben left the BBC soap back in 2015, to the disappointment of fans 
He decided to bow out after he discovered who had really killed his twin sister Lucy: his younger brother Bobby. 
He and Lauren Branning left the show together, but Lauren later returned with Peter's half-brother Steven as her boyfriend. 
Reporters had claimed that Peter had been going to make a comeback to confront Lauren. 
BBC MISSED: EastEnders fans are anticipating a comeback soon Sexiest soap stars Tuesday, 14th February 2017 Check out our gallery on the sexiest soap stars of our time, from Brooke Vincent to Jennifer Metcalfe 1 / 95 
Now, actor Ben Hardy has been confirmed to be returning to BBC One. 
However, it is not to play Peter in EastEnders, but a part in drama The Woman in White. 
He will play Walter Hartright, who encounters a ghostly woman dressed all in white as he is travelling along a road. 
GETTY FILM STAR: Ben is starting to make his move on Hollywood Related videos
